short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quantum Quips: a browser extension with inspiring quotes from scientists and astrophysicists, perfect for curious minds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Quantum Quips, the Chrome extension that brings inspiration and motivation to your daily browsing.

With Quantum Quips, you'll receive a daily dose of wisdom from renowned scientists, philosophers, and thinkers, displayed prominently on your browser. The extension offers a wide variety of quotes, from profound and thought-provoking to lighthearted and humorous, to keep you engaged and uplifted.

Quantum Quips also features a stunning space background that dynamically generates random stars, planets, and spaceships to create a visually stunning browsing experience. The extension offers customization options, allowing users to adjust the font size of the quote and even have the quote read aloud to them with a simple click of a button.

Whether you're working, studying, or simply browsing the web, Quantum Quips provides a refreshing break that promotes positive thinking and encourages personal growth. Install Quantum Quips today and elevate your browsing experience with daily inspiration and breathtaking visuals.
